©Asunción Gómez-Pérez
- 84
Demonstration of Flood Response
A Coastal Flood Warning:
• Wave heights
• Tidal heights
• Sea defence failure probability
• Modelled data
• Observed data
Response requires knowledge of:
• Where people are
• The state of the roads
• The assets at risk
Utilising:
• WP2 – Data management
• WP3 – Stream & Ontology
• WP4 – Registry
84
Second Year Review Meeting - Brussels, 16 -17 Nov
speaker: SYSTEM
